sentence.Network_en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentence.Network_cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentence.Network_en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentence.Network_cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentence.Network_en: One of the office girls was down with the flu.
